Hope Cemetery
-------------

![cemetery resize](https://cityofhenrietta.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/cemetery-resize.jpg)  
(940)538-6415 Office  
(940) 782-1686 Sexton

Office Hours 8:00 a.m.-4:00 p.m.  
Gate Hours Sunrise to Sunset

Email us at [hopehenrietta@aol.com](mailto:hopehenrietta@aol.com)  
or send a note to:

Hope Cemetery  
P.O. Box 409/ 600 N. Red River  
Henrietta, Texas 76365

If you would like for us to look someone up in the  
cemetery for you or just ask about lot prices, send an  
email or call us and we will try to get the information back  
to you as soon as possible.

You can also visit [https://www.findagrave.com](http://www.findagrave.com)  
to look up someone in the cemetery or see our Facebook page [https://www.facebook.com.](https://www.facebook.com/messages/hopecemetery)

Donations:  
If you would like to donate toward the upkeep of the  
cemetery, make your donation payable to  
Hope Cemetery Association,  
P.O. Box 409, Henrietta, Texas 76365
